name: Cards Infinity
description:
Play CARDS INFINITY, an endless card game with ZERO ADS and ZERO PURCHASES.

APP OF THE WEEK TouchArcade:
"I can’t stop playing. [Cards Infinity] is just a phenomenally well-built game, with gorgeous animations and these dynamic piano sound effects that add tremendously to the excitement you feel when setting up huge streaks."
- TouchArcade, January 14, 2022

HOW TO PLAY
Match cards with higher or lower cards, and build up a streak. When there is no match, choose a card to trade in, and watch your streak go back to the top. Play as long as you can, and get the highest score.

COMPETE
Compete with other players in the daily, weekly, monthly and yearly rankings. Watch the ranking count down and see who wins to become the #1 player of the day, week, month and year.
